ValueEntry.Name: Perfect Lens Chromer
ValueEntry.Description: A variant of the lens chromer tuned specifically for perfect lenses, using less chromium and working faster than the basic chromer by skipping polishing.

ValueEntry.Name: Exceptional Lens Chromer
ValueEntry.Description: A variant of the lens chromer tuned specifically for exceptional lenses, using less chromium and working faster than the basic chromer by skipping polishing.
